border-color.description: The color of the table border

bg-color.description: The background color of the table

align.description: The content alignment of cells is similar to text-align in CSS
align.description_zh: 单元格的内容对齐方式，作用类似css的text-align

padding.description: The padding of cells is the same as the padding of CSS
padding.description_zh: 单元格的内边距，同css的padding写法

th-style.description: th cell style, object form (put the th required parameters in the table component, in order to avoid having to write each th component again)
th-style.description_zh: th单元格的样式，对象形式(将th所需参数放在table组件，是为了避免每一个th组件要写一遍)
